label: Name of Business (Doing Business As)
description: Name under which the MEHKO operates.

label: Initials
description: Initials of the owner/operator confirming the statement regarding the employee limit.

label: Number of Employees
description: Total number of employees working in the MEHKO.

label: Employee 1
description: Number of hours Employee 1 will work per week.

label: Employee 2
description: Number of hours Employee 2 will work per week.

label: Employee 3
description: Number of hours Employee 3 will work per week.

label: Employee 4
description: Number of hours Employee 4 will work per week.

label: Do you plan to operate a Compact Mobile Food Operation (CMFO) in combination with the MEHKO?
description: Checkbox to indicate if the applicant plans to operate a CMFO in addition to the MEHKO.

label: Number of Carts
description: CheckBox to select how many carts (One or Two) will be used in CMFO.

label: Initials
description: Initials of the owner/operator confirming the statement regarding the need of an additional permit for CMFO.
